title: Trump Enacts Federal Funding Freeze, Still Ongoing
content: On January 27, 2025, the White House issued a memo ordering a temporary pause on all federal financing assistance. This includes grants and loans. However, this exempted Social Security and Medicare. The next day, Judge Loren Alikhan temporarily blocked the funding freeze, citing it to be potentially unconstitutional.

title: Trump Announces Tariffs to Come to Canada, Mexico Saturday
content: President Trump announced tariffs will be coming to Canada and Mexico by Saturday. Tariffs are a tax on imported goods. Despite the signing of USMCA, Trump intends to place tariffs on America's bordering nations. This could potentially lead to a trade war and tariffs against the U.S., primarily affecting the consumers, or the citizens. We will update once there are further developments.
